author: boudoul
body:
Re-organizing and cleaning as presented in the tk upgradesimulation here  : https://indico.cern.ch/event/442141/session/2/contribution/8/attachments/1205469/1756540/workflows_upgsim_151215.pdf
To summarize : 
- rename 2023muondev as 2023TiltedTK  (contains the phase2 tilted tracker)
- reorganizing the tracker xmls subdirectories (FlatTracker and TiltedTracker)
- new xmls from Gabrielle (@ghugo83) Tilted and Flat (last xml version as presented in the same meeting  including the stacks from @ebrondol )
- propagation all those new subdirectories in the supported workflows (flat tracker for all the workflow tested in the PR tests) and Tilted in 2023TiltedTK (WF# 10800)
- Adding printouts specifying which tracker is configured (tilted, flat , obsolete, ...)
title: Cleaning old Tracker WFs - Introducing Tilted Tracker
